name: After The End: The Harvest
description: ​The goal is simple, the game is hard, reach the centre. After The End: The Harvest is an immersive retro open-universe space adventure and exploration ARPG. Seamlessly travel across space, catch monsters, take on quests and fight Titans in whatever order you choose.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon 5700 HD or Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
